videos.description: 1H (13:38) WVU Jonathan Holton Steal to made Dunk.
videos.headline: J. Holton Steal to made Dunk.

videos.description: 1H (11:40) WVU Jonathan Holton made Dunk. Assisted by Brandon Watkins.
videos.headline: J. Holton made Dunk. Assisted by B. Watkins.

videos.description: West Virginia's Brandon Watkins gets charged with a flagrant foul 1 after hitting TCU's Karviar Shepherd in the midsection.
videos.headline: West Virginia's Watkins gets flagrant 1 for hitting TCU player

videos.description: 1H (10:53) TCU Chauncey Collins Four Point Play.
videos.headline: C. Collins Four Point Play.

videos.description: 1H (9:45) WVU Jonathan Holton made Dunk. Assisted by Tarik Phillip.
videos.headline: J. Holton made Dunk. Assisted by T. Phillip.

videos.description: 2H (15:59) TCU Chauncey Collins made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Michael Williams.
videos.headline: C. Collins made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by M. Williams.

videos.description: West Virginia's Jonathan Holton runs the floor in transition, gets the ball and finishes off glass to tie the game at 60 against TCU.
videos.headline: Holton's sweet layup pulls WVU even with TCU

videos.description: TCU's Chris Washburn backs in a defender, then makes multiple fakes while pivoting, eventually scoring to give the Horned Frogs a 73-72 lead over the Mountaineers.
videos.headline: This is how to use your pivot foot

videos.description: 2H (4:28) TCU Malique Trent made Dunk. Assisted by Chris Washburn.
videos.headline: M. Trent made Dunk. Assisted by C. Washburn.

videos.description: 2H (3:16) TCU Technical Foul on Chris Washburn, his 5th foul.
videos.headline: Technical Foul on C. Washburn, his 5th foul.

videos.description: 2H (2:58) WVU Jaysean Paige made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Nathan Adrian.
videos.headline: J. Paige made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by N. Adrian.

videos.description: 2H (0:33) WVU Tarik Phillip made Dunk then called for Technical Foul for hanging on the rim.
videos.headline: T. Phillip made Dunk then called for Technical Foul for hanging on the rim.
